textBeforeTable: SOS 2014 System Requirements: Note: XP users MUST have Service Pack 3 Installed; XP will NOT be supported after this 2014 release. Windows RT is NOT supported. Vista users MUST have Service Pack 2 installed prior to installation. Vista, Windows 7 & Windows 8 users are strongly recommended to meet the optimal performance requirements. Only English Language versions of Microsoft are supported. Updated user interface, audible notifications for new messages, and more! New teacher reports that display the percentage complete for each course and units assigned and a Daily Homework Report showing assignments due that day.
